name: The Blood Neck Boy [Demo]
description: well here's a horror game I've been working on for a while and I sorta got bored of making it so I'm uploading this demo and if the game is enjoyed then I'll be sure to keep working on it!!! and some of you may have come from my very unpopular YouTube channel, so if you liked my game at all be sure to go to https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBg3LiSJUm6PLOrwaB1h9Qg and subscribe, and sorry for the glitches in advanced
